snippet: Russian bloggers, activists, entrepreneurs and journalists posted messages on social networks welcoming Edward J. Snowden to his new home.
abstract: Russian bloggers, activists, entrepreneurs and journalists posted messages on social networks welcoming Edward J. Snowden to his new home.

byline.original: By ILYA MOUZYKANTSKII and ROBERT MACKEY

headline.main: Russian Bloggers Welcome Snowden With Jokes, Praise and Job Offers
